title: Financial Health Check-Up questionnaire with scoring results and WhatsApp contact page

requirements.text: Create a dynamic, professional Financial Health Check-Up page that presents exactly 10 provided questions with Yes/No answers only (no free-text), allowing the user to answer all questions and submit.

quotes: Please make a dynamic and professional page for know financial health check up with 10 question answer , answer will be only yes/no formet

These are ten question
Please make it in yes/no formet

acceptanceCriteria: The page displays all 10 questions exactly as provided by the user.
Each question can be answered only with Yes or No (e.g., radio buttons, toggle, segmented control).
A Submit (or equivalent) action is available and is disabled until all 10 questions are answered.
The page layout is responsive (mobile + desktop) and looks professional.

requirements.text: Implement scoring and results display based on the total number of “Yes” answers, and show the result immediately after submission. Use these result bands (inclusive): 0–5 = "Critical Zone"; 6–7 = "Need to review your financial plan"; 8–9 = "Good"; 10 = "Secure". Also display the numeric score (e.g., “Your score: 7/10”).

quotes:
Results show on answer base in this type
1 to 5 critical zone
5 to 7
need to review your financial plan
8 to 9 good

 10 secure

acceptanceCriteria: After submitting, the UI shows the total Yes count out of 10.
The UI shows exactly one of the four result labels based on the score band.
The boundary overlap in the user text is resolved so that 0–5 maps to Critical Zone and 6–7 maps to Need to review your financial plan (no ambiguous outcomes).
The user can change answers and re-submit to get an updated result (or the result updates live).

requirements.text: Add a dedicated Contact page (or clearly separated Contact section reachable via navigation) offering a review of the user’s financial health by the app owner, including a “Contact Now” button that opens WhatsApp chat to +91 88299 21156 (use a wa.me link).

quotes: Make a contact page if he want to review his financial health by me where add my whatsApp no 918829921156 with contact now button

acceptanceCriteria: There is a visible way to reach the Contact page/section from the main questionnaire page (e.g., top nav link/button).
The Contact Now button opens WhatsApp using a link targeting phone number 918829921156 (e.g., https://wa.me/918829921156).
The Contact page/section contains clear English copy indicating the user can request a review of their financial health.

requirements.text: Apply branding: set a provided background image behind the main page layout and display an Axis Max Life logo in the UI (e.g., header/top-left). Use locally served static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated.

quotes: Please add this image in background and set a axis max life logo

acceptanceCriteria: The Financial Health Check-Up page uses a background image asset (served from frontend/public/assets/generated) and remains readable (overlay/blur/tint as needed).
An Axis Max Life logo image is displayed prominently and does not distort (keeps aspect ratio).
No image assets are fetched from the backend; they are served as static files from the frontend.

requirements.text: Create and apply a consistent, coherent visual theme for a professional finance/insurance experience (colors, typography, spacing, component styling) across the questionnaire and contact views. Do not use a blue+purple primary palette.

quotes: Please make a dynamic and professional page

acceptanceCriteria: A consistent theme is applied across all screens (questionnaire, results, contact).
The chosen primary palette is not blue+purple.
UI components (buttons, cards, inputs) look cohesive and professional on mobile and desktop.

constraints: Frontend must not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose them instead).

Frontend must not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor; only add backend work if strictly necessary (this feature can be frontend-only).
nonGoals: Persisting questionnaire results to the backend canister.
Real-time messaging/chat or any WhatsApp API integration beyond a simple outbound link.
Adding additional questions beyond the provided 10.

required: Professional finance-themed background image with subtle pattern/gradient suitable for overlayed UI (financial-health-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Axis Max Life logo on transparent background, clean vector-like look (axis-max-life-logo.dim_600x200.png)
